about.details:
Incorporated in 2007, Gujarat based Aakash Exploration Services Limited is a company engaged in providing services for Oil and Gas Exploration.

The company is an ISO 9001 14001 and OHSAS 18001 certified company. It provides Mobile Work Over Rigs, Hot Oil Circulation Unit, Air Compressor, Mobile Steaming Unit (Boiler), Mobile Pumping Unit, Crane, Manpower Services, SRP Unit supply and Maintenance and other similar Services.

Aakash Exploration is providing Oil and Gas field Services to M/S Oil & Natural Gas Corporation Ltd (A Govt. of India Company), Ahmedabad, Mehsana and Hazira Projects and also providing similar services to private oil field operators namely GSPCL, Cairn, Essar, Great Eastern Energy, IOC, Niko, OIL, Price Petroleum etc to their extreme satisfaction. Aakash Exploration Services Limited is a national group of Oil and Gas Field Services with a staff of more than 250 employees and operating in more than 7 states of India.

faqs.question: What is the Aakash Exploration IPO?
faqs.answer:
Aakash Exploration IPO is a SME IPO of 1800000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.08 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹56 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on April 17, 2018, and closes on April 19, 2018.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Aakash Exploration IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Aakash Exploration IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Aakash Exploration IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Aakash Exploration IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Aakash Exploration IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Aakash Exploration IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Aakash Exploration IPO opens on April 17, 2018 and closes on April 19, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Aakash Exploration IPO?
faqs.answer: Aakash Exploration IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,12,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Aakash Exploration IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Aakash Exploration IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Aakash Exploration IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Aakash Exploration IPO will be done on Tuesday, April 24, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, April 26, 2018. Check the Aakash Exploration IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Aakash Exploration IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Aakash Exploration IPO listing date is on Friday, April 27, 2018.
